views.markdown:
Version 1.0.4 - Added the option to make with No Blur the Background of the Notification Center (Feature included also here and exported from betterNC10). - Some Fixes. Version 0.0.1-3
- Added the option to remove the Widgets in the Notification Center (incorporation of NCShyWidgets on my Personal Repository).
- Small Improvements in Settings.


Version 0.0.1-2
- Added the option to make Dark, Clear or Grey the Background of the Notification Center (iOS 10).
- Added the option to disable the Invoke Gesture of the Notification Center by pulling down on the StatusBar (incorporation of NCNoInvoke on my Personal Repository).
- Changes and Improvements in Settings.
